entry.title: ROSEBURG RECEIVES FIRST MEASURABLE RAIN IN A MONTH
entry.summary: June 21, 2025 7:50 a.m. Roseburg received its first measurable rain in a month on Friday. Forecasters at the National Weather Service in Medford told News Radio 93-9 FM and 1240 KQEN that .08 inches of precipitation was recorded at the Roseburg Regional Airport. The last rain came on May 20th when .02 of precipitation...

entry.title: OREGON’S UNEMPLOYMENT RATE WAS 4.8 PERCENT IN MAY
entry.summary: June 19, 2025 3:40 a.m. Oregon’s unemployment rate was 4.8 percent in May and 4.7 percent in April, after rising gradually from 4.1 percent in May 2024. entry.title: CHI MERCY HEALTH TO HOST EMERGENCY RESPONSE EXERCISE
entry.summary: June 19, 2025 2:50 a.m. CHI Mercy Health will hold an incident response exercise on Mercy’s main campus next Tuesday, June 24th A release said the exercise will occur from approximately 9:00 p.m. to 4:00 p.m.at 2700 Northwest Stewart Parkway. It will have no immediate impact on patient care.
